author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
This is a pretty atypical name for a Julia package, see the package naming guidelines:

https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/v1/creating-packages/#Package-naming-guidelines-1

In general, package and module names are TitleCase and using underscores is unusual. So a more standard way of naming this package would be to call it `DPMMSubClusters.jl`.
The module name and corresponding file name should also be `DPMMSubClusters` or the package will not be loadable.

Forgot about that, sorry, updated now :
https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/1181
